topic.title: : Open Source and Third-Party Software License Agreements

body.p: The Open Source and Third-Party Software License Agreements for are available as a PDF download.
You can download the open source libraries included with the Vertica components at https://my.vertica.com/licenses/.

You can obtain a ZIP containing source code for components where HPE has an obligation to or, in its sole discretion, chooses to make the source code for such components available under the applicable open source software license at the Software Entitlement Portal.
